dataTemplate.name: BCO_SHIPMENT_ACTUALS_TRANS
dataTemplate.description: BCO Shipment Actuals Transmission to AS400

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE -7,'MM/DD/YYYY') start_dt, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM/DD/YYYY') end_dt FROM DUAL

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(itrans.insert_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY'),'MM/DD/YYYY'),'fmMM/DD/YYYY') insert_date, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(itrans.insert_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY HH:MI:SS AM'), 'MM/DD/YY HH:MI:SS AM'),'fmHH12:fmMI:SS AM') insert_time, glog_util.remove_domain(itrans.insert_user) user_id, sref.shipment_refnum_value loc_code, glog_util.remove_domain(itr.object_gid) shipment_id FROM i_transmission itrans LEFT OUTER JOIN i_transaction itr ON itrans.i_transmission_no = itr.i_transmission_no LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON itr.object_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' WHERE itrans.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND itrans.external_system_gid = 'SCOULAR.ACTUAL SHIPMENT' AND (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(itrans.insert_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY') >= TO_DATE(SYSDATE - 7,'dd-mm-rr') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(itrans.insert_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY') <= TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'dd-mm-rr')) ORDER BY itrans.insert_date DESC
